item.title: 7 reasons why John Galliano should totally design next Pope's vest
item.description: Ok, this stupid post may be a little too much, but I wrote it down just for fun and somehow I found it worked (well, for me). Said that, here are the 7 reasons why John Galliano should totally design next Pope’s vest (or what it is called). 1. He has a lot of spare time.
